nodes.bodyText: I think this is a bit too long of an if statement.
Why is I in here capitalized?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -264,6 +264,9 @@ anvil:
 brewing_stand:
   not-working: '&4You cannot use Slimefun Items in a brewing stand!'
 
+cartography_table:
+  not-working: '&4You cannot use Slimefun Items in a cartography table!'

nodes.bodyText: The Cartography table doesn't exist in 1.13 I think, so this will require a version check here

You should probably format it like it was done with the Grindstone here:
https://github.com/Slimefun/Slimefun4/pull/2377/files#diff-1d5c31c48a96cc8f0cfae3f72789abd9R43-R47
Because I think a comment explaining why we abort on earlier versions is important to keep there.
Why do you create a variable here? This just creates an unnecessary memory heap for gc to clean.
